creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text:
I tried to "trigger" the image upload, but the only thing happening is that the
items in the "Edit" menu change.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: Image upload is possible with the Bitflux editor in 1.2.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
once we add it we should make sure to unify the handling of the asset metadata
between bxe and the image upload from the menu.

bxe uses the size attribute, the menu item uses

    <xsl:variable name="extent">
      <xsl:value-of select="dc:metadata/dc:extent"/>
    </xsl:variable>

(also there is the config/assets/insertAsset.xml to consider. not sure if we
need it in the core?)

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: it doesnt make sense to provide this functionality.
